name: Operation Artichoke
description:
Work with  the CIA to solve puzzles, escape the insane asylum and save America!

Original music and art.

Made in two weeks for the $104 Adventure Game Challenge
https://itch.io/jam/104-adventure-game-challenge

CONTROLS:

WASD, SPACE, and NUM KEYS

REQUIREMENTS:

Windows 10, or Linux (using Wine).

Just extract the zip and run the executable.

No obligation to donate. All proceeds go towards a local charity.

CREDITS:

Written in C++ using the wonderful Pixel Game Engine header file

https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/olcPixelGameEngine/wiki

and the SoLoud library

https://sol.gfxile.net/soloud/

Thanks to sudoDavi, compostking68, Ian Wisneski, Rachel Ziolkowski, John Mobley, Neil Figuracion, Caleb Plehn and Jared Sheldon for testing.
